mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point ( account_id, amount, created_time, modified_time) VALUES ( ${accountId}, 0, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT account_id AS accountId, amount AS amount, created_time AS createdTime, modified_time AS modifiedTime FROM point WHERE account_id = ${accountId}
mapper.update: UPDATE point SET amount = amount - ${amount}, modified_time = NOW() WHERE account_id = ${accountId}
UPDATE point SET amount = amount + ${amount}, modified_time = NOW() WHERE account_id = ${accountId}
